dialog.deleteText: Are you sure to delete these {0} item?

header.emptySearchNotice: Get the first page of each tracker
header.navBarTip: Click to show/hide the navigation bar
header.searchTip: Input keyword, IMDb numbers to search
header.wrongPixelRatioNotice: Your page display may be affected by zooming. It is recommended to zoom at 100% to ensure your browsing experience~

layout.init: Please wait patiently for the page to load.....

SearchConfig.mediaSearchLimit: Number of search results per request
SearchConfig.mediaSearchLimitMessage: Please do not load too many search results at once. It's not optimized with virtual-scroll, which may cause the browser to freeze and affect the performance of the media server.
SearchConfig.autoLoadInitialMediaWall: Automatically load the initial media wall
SearchConfig.autoLoadMoreMediaOnScroll: Automatically load more media when scrolling to the bottom of the page

connectCheck.error: Connect Failed! Check Form Input or Remote Server
connectCheck.success: Connect Successful! You can enter next step.

resultParseStatus.CFBlockedNotes: It may be because the site has enabled CloudFlare's security protection, which makes it impossible to retrieve data. Usually you need to wait for the site to recover on its own.

SpecialThank.sortByName: The list is sorted by name
thankNote: During the development and testing of this project, they have given a lot of help and support (or development, or testing, or sending invite, or suggesting, or encouraging, or spurring), thank you.
Since we can't list all the people who helped, Please understand if there are any omissions.
Thanks for these at the same time:

TechnologyStack.thankNote: The birth of 'PT Plugin Plus' is established on the base of these projects. Thanks all the participants of the project, thanks for your contribution!

MediaServerEntity.noItems: No Items, use Search Input or Load More Button to Load

index.onlyShowUserLevelRequirement: Only show the upgrade queue in level requirements
index.showNextLevelInTable: Show next level requirements in Table
index.showNextLevelInDialog: Show next level requirements in Level Requirement Dialog
index.updateAtFormatAsAlive: Display update At as Relative Time

HistoryDataView.title: User History Data @
HistoryDataView.deleteConfirm: Confirm to delete this history data?

alert.enterKeyword: Please enter keywords to start searching

index.socialInformationSearchOnNewTab: Open Media Rating Search in a New Tab
index.uploadAtFormatAsAlive: Display Upload Time as Relative Time

ui.tableMultiSortNote: Multi-column sorting: Click any table header field to start sorting, which will display the number \"1\" on the field. Click other fields sequentially to display \"2\", \"3\", indicating sorting priority. Click the same field again to toggle between ascending, descending, or cancel sorting. The sorting order is determined by these numbers, with smaller numbers having higher priority.

localDownloadMethodOptions.webTip: Open the page corresponding to the download link (only applicable to the simplest method; if conditions are not met, it will fall back to @:SetBase.download.localDownloadMethodOptions.extension )
localDownloadMethodOptions.browserTip: (RECOMMEND) Use the browser's download method provided by the extension to download directly
localDownloadMethodOptions.extensionTip: The extension downloads the torrent in the background and proxies it to @:SetBase.download.localDownloadMethodOptions.browser for downloading

download.saveDownloadHistory: Save download history (Please do not disable this function unless necessary)
download.localDownloadIgnoreInterval: Ignore site download interval limit for local downloads
download.saveLastDownloader: Save the last used download server settings
download.allowDirectSendToClient: Allow sending links directly (instead of torrent files) to the download server (Do not enable unless necessary)

add.newType: Come here to add the server type you want!
add.title: Add Download Client

delete.text: Are you sure to delete these {0} Download Servers?

editor.addressTip: Full Server Address (may include port or path), Like: http://192.168.1.1:5000/
editor.autoStart: Automatically start downloading when sending a torrent
editor.nameTip: Pick a nice and recognizable name for this Download Server

index.emptyNotice: Before using the download service, you need to add at least one download server.

remove.multi: Are you sure to delete these {count} download servers?
remove.single: Are you sure to delete this download server?

action.setPathAndTag: Set Suggest Download Path and Tags
action.setDefault: Set this downloader server as Default Downloader.

downloadPath.autoImport: One-click to import of existing @:SetDownloader.PathAndTag.downloadPath.title from the downloader

tags.title: Tags
tags.autoImport: One-click to import of existing @:SetDownloader.PathAndTag.tags.title from the downloader

note.title: Note

edit.filterPlaceholder: Filter by site name or url

delete.text: Are you sure to delete these {0} @:SetSearchSolution.solution ?

add.selectSitePlaceholder: Please Select a site to add (support search in url and site name)
add.title: Add Site

delete.text: Are you sure to delete these {0} Site?

editor.addUrlTip: Add a site url which you current used, for example: https://example.com/
editor.sortIndexTip: Can be used for search sorting
editor.tagTip: Press Enter to add a tag after typing. (Only the first 4 will be displayed on the list page)
editor.uploadSpeedLimitHint: Set upload speed limit (MB/s) when pushing torrents to downloader, 0 or empty means unlimited

index.flushFaviconFinish: The selected site favicon has been flushed successfully!
settingNote: Only the configured site will display the plugin icon and the corresponding function;
the offline site will no longer participate in the search and information acquisition;

spDialog.noDefNotice: This site does not define any search categories, please go to help!
spDialog.notice: It is not recommended to set it here, and it is recommended to configure your user CP in site or use search solution
spDialog.selectAllNotice: (Notice: In most cases, you don't need to select all search terms! )
spDialog.title: Set default search params for Site {name}

oneClickImportDialog.title: One-Click Import Sites
oneClickImportDialog.alert1: This operation will attempt to import the sites you select with default configurations. Please ensure you have logged into these sites in your browser. The import process cannot be interrupted, please wait patiently.
oneClickImportDialog.stats: Selected {count} sites, added {success} sites, failed to add {failed} sites.

status.manual: This site needs to be added manually

userInfo.showDeadSite: Show sites marked as dead (isDead) in the overview
userInfo.showPassedSite: Show sites marked as offline (isOffline) or not allowing user info query in the overview

ptppSettings.saveKeyNotice: Note: The key is only saved in the current browser and will not be backed up, please keep it safe; data cannot be recovered if the key is lost after encryption. Leave blank for no encryption.
ptppSettings.invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format, please check if the backup was exported correctly (with the backup encryption feature turned off).
ptppSettings.importConfigInfoLine1: {repoName} can only import user history data from the original PT-Plugin-Plus. Other configuration files are not supported.
ptppSettings.importConfigInfoPrep: Before importing, please make the following preparations:
ptppSettings.importStep1: First, please back up the current configuration file of {repoName}.
ptppSettings.importStep2: In the site settings of {repoName}, add the sites that need to be restored. (If a site is not added, its corresponding user history data will be ignored).
ptppSettings.importStep3: In PT-Plugin-Plus, disable the backup encryption feature and export the local backup file. It should be a zip file named PT-Plugin-Plus-Backup-yyyy-MM-DD_hh-mm-ss.zip.
ptppSettings.importStep4: Upload the zip package or the extracted userdatas.json file to the input box below.

socialConfig.cacheShortWarning: A cache time that is too short will lead to frequent requests, while one that is too long will result in outdated data.
socialConfig.ptgenApiMessages: Select a built-in address or enter an address like https://example.com/ptgen?site=<site>&sid=<sid>
socialConfig.anidbClientMessages: Please apply for a Client ID at https://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=client and fill it in the format `Name/Version`.
socialConfig.bangumiApiMessages: You can generate an Access Token at https://next.bgm.tv/demo/access-token
